text.section:
The Commissioner may grant weekend leave to an inmate if:
the inmate has participated for at least 2 months in the work-release program established under § 3-801 of this subtitle; and
the inmate's direct Division supervisor in the work-release program recommends the inmate for weekend leave.

The Commissioner shall:
determine whether to grant authorization for weekend leave; and
establish terms and conditions for weekend leave, which may include the inmate's waiver of the right to contest extradition proceedings.
Weekend leave may not begin before 6 p.m. Friday or end after 6 p.m. on the Sunday that immediately follows.
